name: seafile
description: Seafile is a self-hosted file sync and share platform with high performance and efficient storage. It supports team collaboration, versioning, and desktop/mobile clients.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Syncs files across devices with efficient delta transfers and conflict resolution

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share libraries with groups for collaborative file management and editing

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Protects sensitive data with client-side encryption for secure storage

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and sync files from iOS and Android devices with offline support

features.title: Online Editing
features.description: Edit documents directly in the browser with integrated office suite

features.title: File Locking
features.description: Prevents concurrent edits with automatic file locking during modifications
